channel.title: Nooney Rickett – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: Here Comes Summer…..
item.dc:creator: garypiggold
item.description: Sure,every time this year,as temps and spirits begin to riseand the time gets right for doing something in the street, we could So easily get laid back and lost within the usual groovesof those Beach Boys,Jan and/or Dean,Fantastic Baggys (!!!)or even Los Nooney Rickett Four. but,If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re ready for a brand new beat insteadall this … Continue reading "Here Comes Summer….."
item.content:encoded:
Sure,
every time this year,
as temps and spirits begin to rise
and the time gets right for doing
something in the street,

we could So easily get
laid back and lost within the usual grooves
of those Beach Boys,
Jan and/or Dean,
Fantastic Baggys (!!!)
or even Los Nooney Rickett Four.

but,
If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re ready for a brand new beat instead
all this summer long,

May I suggest you tune on, log in,
turn up and hang at least 10dB
right over there at
Gary Pig Gold dot com,

thanx to our very hot pals
dba Zuzula, that is.

Listen !!
